channel.title: My server is frozen
channel.description:
I can give you my server link but I wont here because it's classed as advertising.
So heres my story: I've been awaiting my uptime to go back up as it usually does, it dropped to 70% then I waited within a week and it's still frozen at 92% uptime, I would like for it to be deleted or if Mopar decides to add a delete server button only for servers who have been on the sttaus page for one week as I have. Thanks.

item.title: My server is frozen
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:3, topic:362530”]If your server has only been up 92% of the time since it was added, then why should we cheat the system for you?

The answer is we won’t.[/quote]

Exactly, and I’ll never delete servers or add a delete button.

Read full topic
